document.full_text: carolyn goodman, the wife of mayor oscar goodman of las vegas, has been elected to succeed him in a contest that affirmed the city's affection for mr. goodman, its leader for 12 years.
document.title: west: nevada: mayor succeeded by wife
lines_and_colors: carolyn goodman, the wife of mayor oscar goodman of las vegas, has been elected to succeed him in a contest that affirmed the city's affection for mr. goodman, its leader for 12 years.
